events.name: Live Jazz Session
events.description: Swing by our coffee shop for an unforgettable live jazz session. Immerse yourself in the soulful melodies while savoring your favorite brew. Perfect for music lovers and coffee enthusiasts alike.

events.name: Bouquet Workshop
events.description: Learn the art of floral arrangements while enjoying a warm cup of coffee. Connect with fellow enthusiasts and take home your beautiful creations. All materials provided.

events.name: Bring Your Puff
events.description: A fun-filled day with your furry friend at our coffee shop. Enjoy delicious coffee, socialize with other pet owners, and create wonderful memories. Special treats for pets available!

events.name: Flavor Preview
events.description: Be the first to taste our new coffee blends at the 'Flavor Preview' event. Experience unique flavors and provide feedback that will help shape our future offerings.
